description:
The true reason that Nobunaga attacked Muto comes to light, and it was to go after Asakura Yoshikage of the Echizen Province. The allied forces of Oda and Tokugawa first take over Tezutsuyama Castle, and then take over Kanegasaki Castle, but Hisahide and Hanbee seem to think things are going too well...
Source: crunchyroll
